title: MatchCharacter API in SKFontManager Hangs in Xamarin.iOS
body:
**Description**

 MatchCharacter API in SKFontManager Hangs when passing character '\ud83d' as parameter in Xamarin.iOS

**Code**

SKFontManager.Default.MatchCharacter('\ud83d')

**Expected Behavior**

application should not hang

**Actual Behavior**

Application hangs.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  1.59.3
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: Xamarin.iOS
  - iOS:  12.1
- Target Devices:  iPhone XR

> VS bug [#802930](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/802930)
